name: interbranch
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between or involving two or more branches of an organization: We need to improve interbranch communication and cooperation in the coming months and years. They agreed to my proposal that we hold an inter-branch meeting to discuss the draft plan.
More examplesFewer examplesObviously, saying one thing and doing another does not lead to good interbranch relations.Detailed records were kept at head office of all international and interbranch assignments. Welcome to the bi-annual inter-branch poker tournament.
